data.comment: The match is underway at Estadio Jalisco.
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 2, The match has been stopped briefly for attention to the injured Luciano Acosta.
Atlas push forward at Estadio Jalisco and Javier Correa gets in a great header. The attempt is cleared by the Necaxa defence.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 6, Luciano Acosta is back on the pitch.
Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Jalisco.
Lucas Passerini of Necaxa gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 7, It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
Ball safe as Atlas is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Oscar Macias Romo awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 9, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Javier Correa (Atlas) is first to the ball but his header is off-target.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 10, Atlas have a goal kick.
Lucas Passerini is down and play has been interrupted for a few moments.
Necaxa push forward at Estadio Jalisco and Alex Zendejas gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Atlas defence.
In the minute 13, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Necaxa's Lucas Passerini looks ok and returns to the pitch.
In the minute 15, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Can Atlas capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Necaxa's half?
Atlas awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 21, Goal kick for Necaxa at Estadio Jalisco.
Atlas to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
In the minute 26, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 30, Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Luciano Acosta (Atlas) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 32, In Guadalajara, Ignacio Malcorra of Atlas is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Atlas throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Fernando Arce (Necaxa) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 35, Corner awarded to Atlas.
German Conti (Atlas) goes close with a header but the ball is scrambled away by Necaxa defenders.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 37, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
At Estadio Jalisco, Fernando Arce has been yellow-carded for the away team.
Throw-in Necaxa.
In the minute 38, Free kick Necaxa.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Necaxa throw-in in Atlas's half.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 40, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Atlas's Javier Correa gets in a shot on goal at Estadio Jalisco. But the effort is unsuccessful.
In the minute 44, Corner awarded to Atlas.
Atlas's Jesus Angulo gets his shot away but it misses the target.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Necaxa a goal kick.
In the minute 45, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
2 minutes will be added to the 1st half.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 45, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo blows to end the first-half.
In the minute 46, The second-half is now underway.
The away team have replaced Fernando Arce with Juan Delgado. This is the first substitution made today by Luis Alfonso Sosa.
Martin Barragan is replacing Lucas Passerini for the away team.
In the minute 47, Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
Atlas to take a throw-in in Necaxa territory.
Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 50, Luciano Acosta for the home team is judged to be offside.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
In the minute 53, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
Throw-in for Necaxa close to the penalty box.
Ian Gonzalez is on target to give Necaxa a 0-1 advantage.
In the minute 56, In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the home team.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Necaxa.
In the minute 58, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas.
Atlas's Ignacio Malcorra breaks free at Estadio Jalisco. But the strike goes wide of the post.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Guadalajara.
In the minute 59, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Ball goes out of play for a Atlas goal kick.
In the minute 61, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Javier Correa (Atlas) has received a yellow card from Oscar Macias Romo.
Throw-in Atlas.
Necaxa have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 63, Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Atlas.
The match at Estadio Jalisco has been interrupted briefly for a check on Jair Pereira, who is down injured.
Diego Cocca (Atlas) is making a first substitution, with Angel Marquez replacing Jesus Isijara.
In the minute 64, Brayton Vazquez is replacing German Conti for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Throw-in for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Necaxa’s Jair Pereira is on his feet again at Estadio Jalisco.
In the minute 66, Oscar Macias Romo awards the away team a throw-in.
Free kick for Necaxa in the half of Atlas.
In the minute 68, A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Jesus Angulo is booked for the home team.
In the minute 69, Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Ian Gonzalez for Necaxa has been booked by Oscar Macias Romo and receives a first yellow card.
Free kick Necaxa.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
In the minute 71, Atlas drive upfield and Jose Abella gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
Atlas attack but Brayton Vazquez's header doesn't find the target.
In the minute 72, Necaxa have a goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Ball safe as Necaxa is awarded a throw-in in their half.
In the minute 73, Necaxa to take a throw-in in Atlas territory.
Can Atlas get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Necaxa's half?
Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 76, Necaxa awarded a free kick in their own half.
Necaxa are coming forward and Ian Gonzalez gets in a strike, it misses the target, however.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Atlas a goal kick.
In the minute 77, Luis Alfonso Sosa is making the team's third substitution at Estadio Jalisco with Maximiliano Salas replacing Ian Gonzalez.
Alejandro Andrade is on a sub for Claudio Baeza for Necaxa.
Important block from the Necaxa defence as Renato Ibarra fires in a strike for Atlas.
In the minute 79, Oscar Macias Romo signals a Atlas throw-in in Necaxa's half.
Throw-in for Necaxa at Estadio Jalisco.
Throw-in Atlas.
In the minute 80, Throw-in for Necaxa in their own half.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Guadalajara.
In Guadalajara Atlas attack through Luciano Acosta. The finish is off target, however.
In the minute 81, Ball goes out of play for a Necaxa goal kick.
In Guadalajara a free kick has been awarded the away team.
Julio Gonzalez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Necaxa.
In the minute 83, Oscar Macias Romo awards the away team a throw-in.
Javier Correa (Atlas) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Atlas have been awarded a corner by Oscar Macias Romo.
In the minute 84, Atlas are pushing forward but Luciano Acosta's finish is wide of the goal.
Necaxa have a goal kick.
Free kick for Necaxa in their own half.
In the minute 86, Atlas awarded a free kick in their own half.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Necaxa.
Necaxa awarded a throw-in in their own half.
In the minute 87, The away team replace Alex Zendejas with Ricardo Chavez.
Atlas make their third substitution with Ignacio Jeraldino replacing Javier Correa.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas.
In the minute 89, Atlas's Renato Ibarra gets in a shot but it is blocked by a Necaxa defender.
Necaxa's Ricardo Chavez misses with an attempt on goal.
Oscar Macias Romo awards Atlas a goal kick.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a Necaxa throw-in in Atlas's half.
Goal kick for Atlas at Estadio Jalisco.
Oscar Macias Romo will wait an extra 5 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 2nd half.
Throw-in for Atlas in the half of Necaxa.
Atlas pushes forward through Jesus Angulo, whose finish on goal is saved.
Corner awarded to Atlas.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
Can Necaxa get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Atlas's half?
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Atlas in their own half.
Free kick for Atlas in their own half.
Oscar Macias Romo signals a free kick to Necaxa in their own half.
Necaxa's Juan Delgado is on target but unsuccessful.
The match is over. Final score 0-1.
Necaxa's Unai Bilbao has been booked in Guadalajara.
